General.Name: Vtion Wireless Technology AG
General.Description: Vtion Wireless Technology AG, through its subsidiaries, provides wireless data card solutions for mobile computing through broadband wireless networks in China. The company operates in three segments: Wireless Data Terminals, Wireless Intelligent Terminals, and All Others. The company primarily supplies wireless data card products and related after sales service support for the mobile use of computers; and interface conversion card products. It provides a range of 3G wireless data cards that fit PCMCIA, USB, Mini-USB, Express Card 34, and PCI Express Mini interfaces of laptops or personal computers. The company's data cards are used primarily by business customers and governmental organizations to enable their employees to access a range of applications, including the Internet, e-mail, corporate intranet, remote databases, and corporate applications. It also provides wireless routers, broadband servers, wireless high-definition sharers, iPhones, other intelligent mobile phones, network cameras, and accessories in connection with mobile phones; and software services in connection with Android applications, and services in connection with mobile applications designed for insurance industry, as well as a health self-checking instrument in connection with mobile health care. Vtion Wireless Technology AG sells its wireless data cards through mobile network operators, wholesalers, and direct sales. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. Vtion Wireless Technology AG is a subsidiary of Awill Holdings Ltd.
General.Address: Westhafen Tower, Frankfurt am Main, Germany, 60327
